channel.title: Radix Panda
channel.description:
# Radix Panda
![image|500x500](upload://84JTIOtJJJsOtFYuOKBcTBCO7H5.jpeg)
>Radix Panda is a NFT collection of 10 000 unique Pandas. The OG Pandas live in China, but this one is at home on the Radix DLT. They are cute and the charm of the charismatic megafauna definitely shows – our community is proof of that. **Price of each NFT**: 20 XRD **Links**: * [Homepage](https://radixpanda.com) * [Buy page](https://radixpanda.com/buy-here/) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/radixpanda) * [Telegram](https://t.me/radixpanda) * [Trader channel](https://t.me/radixpandatraderchannel)

item.description:
Radix Panda

Radix Panda is a NFT collection of 10 000 unique Pandas. The OG Pandas live in China, but this one is at home on the Radix DLT. They are cute and the charm of the charismatic megafauna definitely shows – our community is proof of that.

Price of each NFT: 20 XRD
